    /**

    • ì—…ë¡œë“œ í•˜ê¸°
    • @param file

    • @param path */ public HashMap<String, String> upload(MultipartFile file, Path path) { HashMap<String, String> result = new HashMap<String, String>(); // íŒŒì¼ ì •ë³´ String fileName = file.getOriginalFilename(); String fileSize = Long.toString(file.getSize()); String fileExt = fileName.substring(fileName.lastIndexOf(â€œ.â€) + 1); String fileType = file.getContentType(); String filePath = â€œâ€; // ê²°ê³¼ ì •ë³´ String status = â€œâ€; String message = â€œâ€; // ì˜ˆì™¸ì²˜ë¦¬ í•˜ê¸°

      // 1. íŒŒì¼ ì‚¬ì´ì¦ˆ if (file.getSize() > MAX_SIZE) { status = â€œfailâ€; message = â€œfile over max upload sizeâ€; result.put(â€œstatusâ€, status); result.put(â€œmessageâ€, message); return result; }

      // 2. íŒŒì¼ í™•ì¥ì // í™”ì´íŠ¸ ë¦¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ë°©ì‹ìœ¼ë¡œ íŒŒì¼ í™•ì¥ì ì²´í¬ if (!Arrays.asList(â€œjpgâ€, â€œpngâ€, â€œgifâ€, â€œjpegâ€, â€œbmpâ€, â€œxlsxâ€, â€œpptâ€, â€œpptxâ€, â€œtxtâ€, â€œhwpâ€) .contains(fileType.toLowerCase())) { status = â€œfailâ€; message = â€œfile type is not allowedâ€; result.put(â€œstatusâ€, status); result.put(â€œmessageâ€, message); return result; }

      // 3. ì €ì¥ íŒŒì¼ ì´ë¦„ ëœë¤í™” String tempName = fileName.substring(0, fileName.lastIndexOf(â€œ.â€)); String encFileName = Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString(tempName.getBytes()); // ì•”í˜¸í™”ëœ ê²½ë¡œë¡œ íŒ¨ìŠ¤ ì„¤ì • filePath = path.toString() + File.separator + encFileName + â€œ.â€ + fileExt;

      // 4. íŒŒì¼ì •ë³´ ë§µì— ë‹´ê¸°. HashMap<String, String> fileInfo = new HashMap<String, String>();

  • FileUploadService.java

    @Override
  public HashMap<String, String> save3(MultipartRequest req) {
      HashMap<String, String> result = new HashMap<String, String>();
      MultipartFile file = req.getFile("singleFile3");
      Path uploadPath = fu.getUploadPath("image");
      result = fu.upload(file, uploadPath);
      return result;
  }
